.. _tutorial_ref:

Tutorials
=========

.. important:: The standard namespace has almost all functions and classes imported that the normal user should need. In case deeper access is needed, all modules are imported as well.

These tutorials give a starting point on how to use the package. For more information and options than described here, please read the API reference.

.. note::

    The tutorials are being updated, and may not be up-to-date with the latest version of SATLAS!
